      public LocalTime startTime
      startTime public variable startTime of type LocalTime. used throughout this (UpdateController) class in association with start combo box items.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      initialize Initializes the stage/scene. Contains conditions and call to update method. Lambda expression sets start hours in addStartComboBox Lambda expression sets end hours in addEndComboBox Lambda expression event listener to determine if updateIDTxtField is null (alert displayed if null, otherwise continue to next condition of attempted update)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Stage path
      resourceBundle - resourceBundle

    • onActionUpdateChooseComboBox

      public void onActionUpdateChooseComboBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onActionUpdateChooseComboBox ActionEvent performed when Appointment or Customer is selected from CHOOSE combo box. Sets visibility of scene elements, calls method(s) to populate table views. Lambda expression to call method to fill fields with data when row in visible table view is clicked
      Parameters:
      event - action event for updateChooseComboBox

    • onActionUpdateHomeBtn

      public void onActionUpdateHomeBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      onActionUpdateHomeBtn ActionEvent performed when HOME button is clicked. Switches scene to main screen of application when HOME button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - action event for updateHomeBtn
      Throws:
      IOException - an I/O Exception has occurred

    • onActionUpdateClearBtn

      public void onActionUpdateClearBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onActionUpdateClearBtn ActionEvent performed when CLEAR button is clicked. Clears text fields and combo box selections.
      Parameters:
      event - action event for updateClearBtn

    • onActionUpdateStateProvinceComboBox

      public void onActionUpdateStateProvinceComboBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onActionUpdateStateProvinceComboBox ActionEvent performed when an item is selected in updateCountryComboBox. Sets the postal text field to editable and formats allowable input based on selection. Lambda expression to limit text field to digits only, with a max length of 5 digits, when U.S. or Canada are selected in the combo box. Lambda expression to limit text field to alphanumeric characters only, with a mx length of 5 characters, when UK is selected from the combo box.
      Parameters:
      event - action event for updateStateProvinceComboBox

    • onActionUpdateContactComboBox

      public void onActionUpdateContactComboBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onActionUpdateContactComboBox ActionEvent performed when an item is selected from updateContactComboBox. Sets text in updateContactTxtField with the selected contact's name.
      Parameters:
      event - action event for updateContactComboBox

    • onActionUpdateCountryComboBox

      public void onActionUpdateCountryComboBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onActionUpdateCountryComboBox ActionEvent performed when an item is selected in updateCountryComboBox. Sets the phone textfield to editable and formats allowable input based on selection. Lambda expression to limit textfield to digits only, with a max length of 10 digits, when U.S. or Canada are selected in the combo box. Lambda expression to limit textfield to digits only, with a mx length of 12 digits, when UK is selected from the combo box.
      Parameters:
      event - action event for updateCountryComboBox

    • onActionUpdateUserComboBox

      public void onActionUpdateUserComboBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onActionUpdateStateProvinceComboBox ActionEvent performed when an item is selected in updateUserComboBox. Sets the user textfield with the selected user's name.
      Parameters:
      event - action event for updateUserComboBox

    • onActionUpdateApptDatePicker

      public void onActionUpdateApptDatePicker(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onActionUpdateApptDatePicker ActionEvent performed when a date is selected from the date picker. Gets value from updateApptDatePicker. If value is null or selected date is today's date or before, an error alert is displayed.
      Parameters:
      event - action event for updateApptDatePicker

    • onCustRowClicked

      public void onCustRowClicked()
      onCustRowClicked Method called when row is clicked in customer tableview. Sets text fields with selected customer's data.

    • onApptRowClicked

      public void onApptRowClicked()
      onApptRowClicked Method called when row is clicked in appointment tableview. Sets text fields with selected appointment's data.

    • populateAppointmentsTable

      public void populateAppointmentsTable()
      populateAppointmentsTable Method called when Appointment is selected in CHOOSE combo box. Populates the Appointment tableview with appointments data.

    • populateCustomersTable

      public void populateCustomersTable()
      populateCustomersTable Method called when Customer is selected in CHOOSE combobox. Populates the Customer tableview with customer data.

    • updateApptToDB

      public void updateApptToDB()
      updateApptToDB Method called when UPDATE button is clicked and all conditions for updating have been met. If all conditions are met (no empty fields, valid business hours and no overlapping appointments for selected customer), then appointment is updated in the database. Alert message is displayed if a condition fails.

    • validateBizHours

      public Boolean validateBizHours(LocalTime startLT, LocalTime endLT, LocalTime bizStartLT, LocalTime bizEndLT)
      validateBizHours Boolean method to check selected start and end times against company's business hours (EST). The start and end times selected from the comboboxes are changed from the user's system default time to EST for comparison.
      Parameters:
      startLT - the selected start LocalTime converted to EST
      endLT - the selected end LocalTime converted to EST
      bizStartLT - company's EST business hours from 8 am to 9 pm EST
      bizEndLT - company's EST business hours from 9am to 10 pm EST
      Returns:
      returns true if INVALID business hours are selected, else false

    • validateOverlap

      public static Boolean validateOverlap(String customerName, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime)
      validateOverlap Boolean method to check selected appointment date and start/end times against existing appointments for the selected customer during the same time period on the same date.
      Parameters:
      customerName - name of customer associated with the appointment
      startDateTime - the selected date and start time
      endDateTime - the selected date and end time
      Returns:
      returns true if there IS an overlap with an existing appointment for this customer, else false
